channel.title: Help with portforwarding anyone think they can help
channel.description:
hi i need some help.. can someone please help me get a no-ip.... i really need one so i can have more people on my server to see how its like :) so it would really make me happy if someone could guide me through no-ip and tell me the site and stuff to go to :)
thanks :]

item.title: Help with portforwarding anyone think they can help
item.dc:creator: @tom_ownz tom_ownz
item.description:
@tom_ownz wrote:

Thanks all for helping “i think it will work” i hope it does

Read full topic

item.title: Help with portforwarding anyone think they can help
item.dc:creator: @KingCjownz KingCjownz
item.description:
@KingCjownz wrote:

www.no-ip.com
Guide :
Register … then log in.
Once logged in Click “Add”.
Choose ur No-ip Name and how you want it to be (eg. No-ip.org , No-ip.info)
Then go to the bottem of page and go Click “Add”.
Then scroll up to Downloads…
Then Download No-ip to your Desktop and now you have no-ip.
Open up The No-ip Duc. and You will see somthing like this
Example :
-yourservername.no-ip.org
-yourservername.no-ip.info

Read full topic
item.source: Help with portforwarding anyone think they can help
